scripts.cognito:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.CognitoApp" -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=todo-app-chapter10 -c applicationUrl=https://app.stratospheric.dev -c loginPageDomainPrefix=stratospheric-chapter10 --require-approval never
scripts.cognito:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.CognitoApp" -c accountId=221875718260 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=todo-app-chapter10 -c applicationUrl=https://app.stratospheric.dev -c loginPageDomainPrefix=stratospheric-chapter10 --force --require-approval never
